page.title: 03Upper Poppleton village
page.content: Upper Poppleton is half of a village two or three miles North-West of the city of{York.} Together with{Nether {Poppleton}it forms a pleasant English village with most of the standard features: a village green, two churches, several farms, shops, pubs, other services and a thriving community life. There has been extensive housing development in Poppleton and this is still in progress. As a result, the village is now primarily a dormitory community for people working in the area. Typical of many UK villages, Poppleton has its amateur drama group, {The Poppleton Players}who attract capacity audiences into a local church hall for their regular performances.
